messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Fun For Your Kidlets
messages.msgSnippet: I guess Yahoo did its thing again.  Here it is again: http://www.chriswetherell.com/hobbit/ ... From: Molly Mahnke  To:
messages.messageBody:
I guess Yahoo did its thing again. Here it is again:
http://www.chriswetherell.com/hobbit/

----- Original Message -----
From: "Molly Mahnke" <elmamahnke@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, June 08, 2001 1:58 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Fun For Your Kidlets


> What site is it that you "ran" names through? Can you give the address?
> Molly
>
>
> --- Lynda <lurine@...> wrote:
> > The kidlets read/had read to them The Hobbits. As fate would have it,
folks
> > on another list discovered this website
> >
> > After running all the kidlets and family through it, I, of course,
couldn't
> > resist running the names of a few other folks through it.
> >
> > Not My Prez: Squinty of Simpleton
> > Gore: Popo Danderfluff of Willowbottom
> > Clinton: Todo Knotwise of Michel Delving
> >
> >
> > Lynda
> > If Ignorance Is Bliss Why Aren't More People Happy?
> >
> >
> >
>
>
> Message boards, timely articles, a free newsletter and more!

messages.subject: Fun For Your Kidlets
messages.msgSnippet: The kidlets read/had read to them The Hobbits.  As fate would have it, folks on another list discovered this website After running all the kidlets and family
messages.messageBody:
The kidlets read/had read to them The Hobbits. As fate would have it, folks
on another list discovered this website

After running all the kidlets and family through it, I, of course, couldn't
resist running the names of a few other folks through it.

Not My Prez: Squinty of Simpleton
Gore: Popo Danderfluff of Willowbottom
Clinton: Todo Knotwise of Michel Delving


Lynda
If Ignorance Is Bliss Why Aren't More People Happy?
